flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
夜行性で　夜に　活動を　始める。
街灯の　灯りに　誘われ　集まった
小さな　虫を　好んで　食べる。

Venomoth is nocturnal—it is a Pokémon that only becomes
active at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gather
around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.

Venomoth è un Pokémon notturno, cioè attivo soltanto
di notte. Le sue prede favorite sono i piccoli insetti che
si raggruppano attorno ai lampioni attratti dalla luce nel buio.

Venomoth es nocturno, solo actúa en la oscuridad.
Su alimento preferido son los pequeños insectos que se
concentran cerca de los focos de luz en la oscuridad de la
noche.

Omot ist ein nachtaktives Pokémon. Kleine Insekten,
die vom Licht in der Dunkelheit angezogen Straßenlaternen
umschwärmen, sind seine bevorzugte Beute.

Aéromite est un Pokémon nocturne, il ne sort donc que
la nuit. Ses proies préférées sont les petits insectes qui
se rassemblent autour des réverbères, attirés par la lumière.

야행성으로 밤에 활동을 시작한다.
가로등 빛에 이끌려 모여든
작은 벌레를 즐겨 먹는다.

やこうせいで　よるに　かつどうを　はじめる。
がいとうの　あかりに　さそわれ　あつまった
ちいさな　むしを　このんで　たべる。

夜行性で　夜に　活動を　始める。
街灯の　灯りに　誘われ　集まった
小さな　虫を　好んで　食べる。

Venomoth is nocturnal—it is a Pokémon that only becomes
active at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gather
around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.

Venomoth è un Pokémon notturno, cioè attivo soltanto
di notte. Le sue prede favorite sono i piccoli insetti che
si raggruppano attorno ai lampioni attratti dalla luce nel buio.

Venomoth es nocturno, solo actúa en la oscuridad.
Su alimento preferido son los pequeños insectos que se
concentran cerca de los focos de luz en la oscuridad de la
noche.

Omot ist ein nachtaktives Pokémon. Kleine Insekten,
die vom Licht in der Dunkelheit angezogen Straßenlaternen
umschwärmen, sind seine bevorzugte Beute.

Aéromite est un Pokémon nocturne, il ne sort donc que
la nuit. Ses proies préférées sont les petits insectes qui
se rassemblent autour des réverbères, attirés par la lumière.

야행성으로 밤에 활동을 시작한다.
가로등 빛에 이끌려 모여든
작은 벌레를 즐겨 먹는다.

やこうせいで　よるに　かつどうを　はじめる。
がいとうの　あかりに　さそわれ　あつまった
ちいさな　むしを　このんで　たべる。

羽に　りんぷんが　ついていて
ヒラヒラと　羽ばたくたびに
猛毒の　粉を　ばらまく。

The wings are covered with dustlike scales.
Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly
toxic dust.

Le ali sono ricoperte di polvere velenosa, che libera
nell’aria a ogni batter d’ali.

Tiene las alas cubiertas de un polvillo de escamas que
esparce cada vez que las bate.

Seine Flügel sind mit staubähnlichen Schuppen
überzogen. Mit jedem Flügelschlag verliert es
hochgiftigen Staub.

Ses ailes sont couvertes d’écailles poudreuses.
À chaque battement d’ailes, il laisse tomber de
la poudre hautement toxique.

날개에 가루가 묻어 있어
팔락팔락 날개를 칠 때마다
맹독 가루를 흩뿌린다.

はねに　りんぷんが　ついていて
ヒラヒラと　はばたくたびに
もうどくの　こなを　ばらまく。

ばらまかれた　りんぷんに　触れると
体の　感覚が　おかしくなって
まっすぐ　立っていられなくなる。

The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who
touches them, making that person unable to stand.

Sparge scaglie che paralizzano chiunque le tocchi,
rendendolo incapace di stare in piedi.

Lanza unas escamas que paralizan a cualquiera.
Quien las toque, no podrá ni ponerse de pie.

Wer die von ihm verstreuten Schuppen berührt,
wird gelähmt und muss sich setzen.

Les écailles qu’il sème ont le pouvoir de paralyser
totalement un ennemi.

흩뿌려진 날개 가루에 닿으면
몸의 감각이 이상해져서
똑바로 서 있을 수 없게 된다.

ばらまかれた　りんぷんに　ふれると
からだの　かんかくが　おかしくなって
まっすぐ　たって　いられなくなる。

It flutters its wings to scatter
dustlike scales. The scales leach
toxins if they contact skin.

It flutters its wings to scatter
dustlike scales. The scales leach
toxins if they contact skin.

It flutters its wings to scatter
dustlike scales. The scales leach
toxins if they contact skin.

Il répand ses écailles poudreuses
en battant des ailes. Elles sont
toxiques au toucher.

It flutters its wings to scatter
dustlike scales. The scales leach
toxins if they contact skin.

Il répand ses écailles poudreuses
en battant des ailes. Elles sont
toxiques au toucher.

When it attacks, it flaps its large
wings violently to scatter its
poisonous powder all around.

It flutters its wings to scatter
dustlike scales. The scales leach
toxins if they contact skin.

It flutters its wings to scatter
dustlike scales. The scales leach
toxins if they contact skin.

It flutters its wings to scatter
dustlike scales. The scales leach
toxins if they contact skin.

The dustlike scales covering its wings
are color-coded to indicate the kinds of
poison it has.

The wings are covered with dustlike
scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it
looses highly toxic dust.

VENOMOTH are nocturnal--they only are
active at night. Their favorite prey are
insects that gather around streetlights,
attracted by the light in the darkness.

VENOMOTH is nocturnal - it is a POKéMON
that only becomes active at night.
Its favorite prey are small insects that gather around streetlights,
attracted by the light in the darkness.

VENOMOTH is nocturnal - it is a POKéMON
that only becomes active at night.
Its favorite prey are small insects that gather around streetlights,
attracted by the light in the darkness.

The scales it
scatters will
paralyze anyone who touches them,
making that person
unable to stand.

The powder on its
wings is poisonous
if it is dark in color. If it is
light, it causes
paralysis.

When it attacks,
it flaps its large
wings violently to scatter its poi­
sonous powder all
around.

The powdery scales
on its wings are
hard to remove. They also contain
poison that leaks
out on contact.

The dust-like
scales covering
its wings are color coded to
indicate the kinds
of poison it has.
